DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare suitability, specificity and sensitivity of the routine smear and the tampon self-test women perform at home. Study hypothesis: The tampon self-test correspond to the routine cervical smear.
DOC.brief_title: Cervix Cytological Screening - Comparison of Tampon Self-Test and the Routine Smear.
DOC.criteria: 1. Women with cervical dysplasia been referred to conisation or 2. Women invited to cervical screening program 1. Women not performing the tampon selftest before conisation or 2. Women not performing the tampon selftest af least 1 month after receiving the tampon
